query:
SELECT t.codigo, t.id, COUNT(f.id) as total_formandos, 
       SUM(CASE WHEN f.cabeloSimples > 0 OR f.cabeloCombinado > 0 OR f.makeFormando > 0 OR f.makeFamilia > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_pacote
FROM turmas t
INNER JOIN formandos f ON f.turmaId = t.id
WHERE f.cabeloSimples > 0 OR f.cabeloCombinado > 0 OR f.makeFormando > 0 OR f.makeFamilia > 0
GROUP BY t.id, t.codigo
ORDER BY com_pacote DESC
LIMIT 5;

FROM turmas t
INNER JOIN formandos f ON f.turmaId = t.id
